mapper.insert: insert into `order` (id, order_no, user_id, sku_id, num, sku_price, total_amount, pay_status, pay_time, pay_url, pay_amount, third_party_serial_number, create_by, update_by) values (#{orderDO.id}, #{orderDO.order_no}, #{orderDO.user_id}, #{orderDO.sku_id}, #{orderDO.num}, #{orderDO.sku_price}, #{orderDO.total_amount}, #{orderDO.pay_status}, #{orderDO.pay_time}, #{orderDO.pay_url}, #{orderDO.pay_amount}, #{orderDO.third_party_serial_number}, #{orderDO.create_by}, #{orderDO.update_by});
